entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is not interested in wearing the diadem. He wants to defeat Voldemort and finish him.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a wizard who calls himself Lord. Harry wants to defeat him.

entities.name: lord
entities.description: Lord is a title given to Voldemort by himself.

relationships.description: Harry is not interested in wearing the diadem, but he wants information about it.
